refnamediv.refpurpose: Copies the transformation matrix from a member of one combination to the member of another.

refsection.para: Copies the transformation matrix from a member of one combination to the member of another.
The example shows the use of the copymat command to set the matrix for a member in one combination equal to the matrix for another member in another combination.

info.title: Set the matrix for a member in one combination equal to the matrix for another member in another combination.

example.para: Sets the matrix for member memb2 in combination comb2 equal to the matrix for member memb1 in combination comb1.

refsection.para: Reports of bugs or problems should be submitted via electronic mail to <devs@brlcad.org>, or via the "cadbug.sh" script.
